  • 方法详细资料

    • getParagraphsByBookId

      @GetMapping("/book/{bookId}/paragraphs") public Response<List<ParagraphDTO>> getParagraphsByBookId(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token, @PathVariable("bookId") Long bookId)

    • getParagraphsByTitle

      @GetMapping("/book-title/{title}/paragraphs") public Response<List<ParagraphDTO>> getParagraphsByTitle(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token, @PathVariable("title") String title)

    • getParaIdsByBookId

      @GetMapping("/book/{bookId}/paraIds") public Response<List<Long>> getParaIdsByBookId(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token, @PathVariable("bookId") Long bookId)

    • addNewParagraph

      @PostMapping("/paragraph") public Response<Long> addNewParagraph(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token, @RequestBody ParagraphRequest paraReq)

    • deleteParagraph

      @DeleteMapping("/paragraph/{id}") public Response<String> deleteParagraph(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token, @PathVariable("id") Long id)

    • getParagraphById

      @GetMapping("/paragraph/{id}") public Response<ParagraphDTO> getParagraphById(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token, @PathVariable("id") Long id)

    • updateParagraphById

      @PutMapping("/paragraph/{id}") public Response<ParagraphDTO> updateParagraphById(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token, @PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestBody ParagraphUpdateRequest paraUpdReq)

    • moveUpParagraphById

      @PostMapping("/paragraph/{id}/move-up") public Response<ParagraphDTO> moveUpParagraphById(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token, @PathVariable("id") Long id)

    • moveDownParagraphById

      @PostMapping("/paragraph/{id}/move-down") public Response<ParagraphDTO> moveDownParagraphById(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token, @PathVariable("id") Long id)

    • getBookByParagraphId

      @GetMapping("/paragraph/{id}/get-book") public Response<BookDTO> getBookByParagraphId(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token, @PathVariable("id") Long id)

    • getAllParagraphs

      @GetMapping("/paragraphs") public Response<List<ParagraphDTO>> getAllParagraphs(@RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)
